name: Delta Quadrant Journal
description: A demo journal for testing the Geoetadata plugin in Janeway, featuring articles with geographic and temporal metadata.

settings.journal_description: A demonstration journal showcasing geographic and temporal metadata capabilities for scholarly articles.
settings.submission_checklist:
- Geographic metadata is encouraged for all submissions
- Temporal coverage should be specified where applicable
settings.copyright_notice: This is demo content. Original articles are subject to their respective copyright notices.
